title: RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN BLE WiFi Breakout Board Specs & Datasheet > RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN + BLE + WiFi Breakout Board Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK11161 Breakout Board Overview
content: The **RAK11161** is a breakout board for the low-power, long-range LoRaWAN module RAK11160 based on the STM32WLE5 MCU with integrated LoRa transceiver. It uses an Espressif ESP8684 co-processor to support Bluetooth 5.0 (with Bluetooth Low Energy support) and WiFi connectivity.
parent_content:
The **RAK11161** is a breakout board for the low-power, long-range LoRaWAN module RAK11160 based on the STM32WLE5 MCU with integrated LoRa transceiver. It uses an Espressif ESP8684 co-processor to support Bluetooth 5.0 (with Bluetooth Low Energy support) and WiFi connectivity.  
Compliant with LoRaWAN 1.0.4 specifications (Classes A, B, and C), the module also supports LoRa point-to-point (P2P) communication, facilitating quick implementation of customized LoRa networks. Additionally, RAK11161 offers three RF communication capabilities (LoRa, BLE, and WiFi), making it well-suited for various IoT applications, such as home automation, sensor networks, building automation, and other IoT network applications.  
By default, RAK11161 runs on the RUI3 (RAKwireless Unified Interface) firmware, allowing standalone operation with custom firmware development via Arduino-compatible RUI3 APIs. Sensors and other external peripherals can connect directly, eliminating the need for an additional MCU. Alternatively, the RAK11161 can be interfaced with an external host MCU using AT commands via UART.

title: RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN BLE WiFi Breakout Board Specs & Datasheet > RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN + BLE + WiFi Breakout Board Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Internal Connections Between STM32WLE5 MCU and ESP32-C2 MCU > Pin Mapping Between STM32WLE5 and ESP32-C2 [TABLE]
content:
| STM32WLE5 Name | STM32WLE5 Pin | ESP32-C2 Name | ESP32-C2 Pin | Function               |
| -------------- | ------------- | ------------- | ------------ | ---------------------- |
| UART TX        | PA2           | UART RX       | MTCK/GPIO6   | UART                   |
| UART RX        | PA3           | UART TX       | MTDO/GPIO7   | UART                   |
| Enable         | PA0           | CHIP_EN       | CHIP_EN      | ESP32-C2 enable        |

| UART RX        | PA3           | UART TX       | MTDO/GPIO7   | UART                   |
| Enable         | PA0           | CHIP_EN       | CHIP_EN      | ESP32-C2 enable        |

title: RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN BLE WiFi Breakout Board Specs & Datasheet > RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN + BLE + WiFi Breakout Board Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > RF Characteristics > LoRa Transceiver > RAK11161 Supported LoRaWAN Bands [TABLE]
content:
The RAK11161 module supports many LoRaWAN bands as shown in the table below.  
| Module | Region | Frequency |
| --- | --- | --- |
| RAK11161 (H) | Europe | EU868 |
| RAK11161 (H) | North America | US915 |
| RAK11161 (H) | Australia | AU915 |
| RAK11161 (H) | Korea | KR920 |
| RAK11161 (H) | Asia | AS923-1/2/3/4 |
| RAK11161 (H) | India | IN865 |
| RAK11161 (H) | Russia | RU864 |

title: RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN BLE WiFi Breakout Board Specs & Datasheet > RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN + BLE + WiFi Breakout Board Datasheet > Specifications > Firmware > RAK11161 WisDuo LPWAN Module Firmware Download [TABLE]
content:
Download the latest RAK11161 WisDuo LPWAN Module firmware provided below. RAK11161 (L) and RAK11161 (H) use the same firmware and it will automatically detect the variant of the module being used.  
| Model           | Version                                                         | Source                                                                                                            |
parent_content:
Download the latest RAK11161 WisDuo LPWAN Module firmware provided below. RAK11161 (L) and RAK11161 (H) use the same firmware and it will automatically detect the variant of the module being used.  
| Model           | Version                                                         | Source                                                                                                            |
| --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| RAK11161 (.bin) | RUI3 Application Code only (default baudrate = 115200)          | [Download](https://downloads.rakwireless.com/RUI/RUI3/Image/RAK11160_latest.bin)       |
| RAK11161 (.hex) | RUI3 Bootloader and Application Code(default baudrate = 115200) | [Download](https://downloads.rakwireless.com/RUI/RUI3/Image/RAK11160_latest_final.hex) |

| --------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| RAK11161 (.bin) | RUI3 Application Code only (default baudrate = 115200)          | [Download](https://downloads.rakwireless.com/RUI/RUI3/Image/RAK11160_latest.bin)       |
| RAK11161 (.hex) | RUI3 Bootloader and Application Code(default baudrate = 115200) | [Download](https://downloads.rakwireless.com/RUI/RUI3/Image/RAK11160_latest_final.hex) |

title: RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN BLE WiFi Breakout Board Specs & Datasheet > RAK11161 WisDuo LoRaWAN + BLE + WiFi Breakout Board Datasheet > Specifications > Certification > AT Command Guide for CE and FCC Certifications
content:
> **TIP:** Note
For CE and FCC certifications we provide an AT command guide.
You can find it in our [RUI3 documentation](https://docs.rakwireless.com/product-categories/software-apis-and-libraries/rui3/certification-guide) or get it from our [Download Center](https://downloads.rakwireless.com/#RUI/RUI3/Certification%20Guide/).
